'''Sojourns of the Barking Fox''' is a part of the [[Secret Summer Paradise]] event in [[Version 3.8]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Secret Summer Paradise Sojourns of the Barking Fox 1.png
|text1  = During the "Sojourns of the Barking Fox" challenge, you must control the Barking Fox to reach its destination within a time limit while obtaining as many Adventure Coins as possible.<br>The more time you have left upon completion and the more Adventure Coins you obtain, the higher your challenge score will be.
|image2 = Tutorial Secret Summer Paradise Sojourns of the Barking Fox 2.png
|text2  = Sleetdross Fruits and Disruptor Orbs that fire Disruption Waves will be in the trials. If the Barking Fox is hit by either the Fruits or the Waves, the time remaining on the trial will decrease, resulting in a lower final score.
}}

==Challenges==
===I - Gentle Ascent===
{{Description|"You'll have to grasp the Barking Fox's operating principles to make it fly in interesting ways!"<br>Madiha has picked out an ideal first flight location for the Barking Fox within the Silver Bottle Courtyard. It's time to learn the ins and outs of this new toy model...}}
